basic.color: Flower color white, flower color brown, purple brown

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients, pH value between 4.8-6.5
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, high quality fruits in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Reduce watering gradually when open flowers, and stop watering when leaves start to turn yellowish
maintenance.fertilization: Soil with enough compost, and apply phosphatic fertilizer during growing period
maintenance.pruning: Harvest potatoes when most of leaves turn yellowish
